<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Limited">[Cloak of Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=1079)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 77</row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained for up to 5 rounds
</row>

</column>

---

You surround yourself in holy light that restores the living and rebuffs undead. You glow with bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light to the next 30 feet. Living creatures that begin their turn adjacent to you recover 2d4 Hit Points. [Undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creatures that begin their turn adjacent to you take 4d4 positive damage.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The healing increases by 1d4, and the damage to undead increases by 2d4.
name: Cloak of Light
